name: Basketball Pinball Arcade HD Free - The Fantasy Ball Machine for iPad & iPhone
name_original: Basketball Pinball Arcade HD Free - The Fantasy Ball Machine for iPad & iPhone
description:
This game isn't normal basketball!
This game isn't than normal pinball!

This game is grazy!
This game is fun!
This game is great with your friends!

Really fun and grazy game for one or two players. Try to make best result for one player game or try to beat your friends with two player game. Fantastic gameplay and real physics make this game totally insane and fun to play!

This is really fun game. Don't miss this!

[ FEATURES ]

+ grazy game
+ great physics
+ easy controls
+ fantastic gameplay
+ fun with your friends
+ simple graphics
+ smooth gameplay
+ Six different balls (different physics)


[ MORE GAMES ]

We have also made other awesome games, so type "Codecube Brothers" to itunes search field and you can find our other games, which are already available in the AppStore!

[ FEEDBACK ]

We can't answer messages that are written on reviews, so please send your feedback, wishes and bug reports to us support [at] ccbrothers [dot] com.

Thanks for your support :)
